The patient are better than warriors,and those who rule their temper, better than the conqueror of a city.

Proverbs 16:32

We may be only months away from having more options on #COVID19.

By this fall we could have monoclonal antibody drugs that can block the coronavirus.

By years end we could have a vaccine.

The goal now is to buy us time & to protect our hospital capacity by slowing the spread.

Glad to see @GovWaste's annual #PigBook is out to shine a powerful light on the worst pork spending in Washington. The men & women of this organization are steadfast allies in the fight to restore fiscal sanity, and I’m proud to stand alongside them each and every day. https://twitter.com/GovWaste/status/1283439763689701382 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1283550909377720320/pu/img/_n5GODESiYFH9ryL.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1283550909377720320/pu/vid/480x270/185sS_thif-GcSxY.mp4?tag=10 QT @GovWaste The #PigBook is an annual list of pork-barrel projects, or earmarks, which are costly, unfair, and inequitable expenditures that increase waste and promote corruption. We will face this in 2020 & every major election in the foreseeable future

And it won’t just be from Russia

Mask wearing isn’t some novel idea they came up with to control us

Surgeons,nurses & dentists have used them forever to protect patients & themselves. 

If it doesn’t work,what’s the harm?

And if it has a 10% chance of getting us back to school,sports & life why not do it?

Last night #Florida remaining hospital capacity was 20.72% & ICU was 15%(not counting additional beds that can be converted).

But these numbers will get much worse if discharges slow down due to not enough doses of Remdesivir.

We can’t wait until July 27th for next allocation.

The #DC school voucher program empowers students and families of all backgrounds with more opportunity. @JoeBiden & @SenSanders want to take that away. This is another blow to hard working Americans. #SchoolChoice

5th largest school district (Miami) has 8 criteria for re-opening:
▪2 of them,positivity rate under 10% & reduced viral burden depends on good data

▪4 of them reduction in hospital & ICU load,increased testing & 48hr results can improve with advances hopefully just weeks away

Did you know that the very workers billionaires rely on are going hungry & without healthcare?

The COVID-19 public health emergency declaration has helped states like Massachusetts expand life-saving services during the pandemic. But this crisis isn’t over.
